getAllProducts: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT
getProductById: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = ?
updateProduct: UPDATE DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.PRODUCT SET PRODUCT = ?, IS_ACTIVE = ?, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE PRODUCT_ID = ?
toggleProductStatus: UPDATE DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.PRODUCT SET IS_ACTIVE = ?, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE PRODUCT_ID = ?
getAllTerms: SELECT TERM_DETAILS_ID, TERM_DETAILS_VALUE, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.TERM_DETAILS ORDER BY TERM_DETAILS_VALUE
getTermById: SELECT TERM_DETAILS_ID, TERM_DETAILS_VALUE, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.TERM_DETAILS WHERE TERM_DETAILS_ID = ?
updateTerm: UPDATE DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.TERM_DETAILS SET TERM_DETAILS_VALUE = ?, IS_ACTIVE = ?, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE TERM_DETAILS_ID = ?
toggleTermStatus: UPDATE DB_DEV_HARMONIZED.POC.TERM_DETAILS SET IS_ACTIVE = ?, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE TERM_DETAILS_ID = ?
